title: American Horror Story 10x03 Promo "Thirst" (HD) This Season On
author: TV Promos
comment: The first two episodes were more incredible than what we’ve been getting for the past five years!
Loving it already!! Seems like Ryan Murphy took those pills before writing this season 🤣
This feels like classic season 1-4 AHS
I'm watching the first episode and I'm beyond impressed tbh
can we all appreciate Lily Rabe, she is such an amazing actress, the whole fucking cast is amazing. BTW I forgot that Billie was also the part of this season, when I saw her I screameddd.
description:
American Horror Story 10x03 "Thirst" Season 10 Episode 3 Promo - Harry's newfound talent brings an unexpected visitor to town. Alma decides to take matters into her own hands. Written by Brad Falchuk; directed by Loni Peristere. Subscribe to tvpromosdb on Youtube for more American Horror Story season 10 promos in HD!
